page.title: 16Ring Road Census, Marldon
page.content: This year people have been very worried about the planned ring road.We went to see how much traffic uses the road. We did our census at 5 Lanes Junction. The most cars came from Paignton to Torquay. We started at 11.05 and finished at 11.35a.m. 316 cars came from Torquay and 379 from Paignton,5 from Preston, 39 from Totnes and 2 from Compton. We sat on the ground and counted the vehicles. We went to the junction on Mondays when the Monday Market was on. There were 10 times as many cars as lories. Most traffic was from Paignton to Torquay, with nearly as much in the other direction, most of the time nose to tail. The next busiest was 5 Lanes Road, then the road to Preston.The road to Compton was hardly used at all.
